title: (x) Experience the difference - El Greco/Calligraphy {David Hamuel, Mike Yanega}
content:
Hello,   
   
What is this font???   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109092935im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/14735.jpg)   
   
Thank you!
author: misalion

comments.content:
Thanks a lot David,   
   
But El Greco is expensive, and it does not seem a 100 % match.   
Is there anything else that is close?   
   
Thank you!

you're right. it doesn't seem a 100% match - the "f".   
   
try - (but what are you looking for - script or swash?) -   
   
\* Admiral script   
   
\* Champion, Derby (designed by Gunter Gerhard Lange. by the way - he designed el greco)   
   
   
   
   
David Hamuel

You're right that it's not an exact match, because the A has been modified. Casaday & Greene has a font they called "Calligraphy" which has that modification. That in turn was 'borrowed' by SSi for something they called "Daniela" (see sample of El Greco and Calligraphy at [http://bowfinprintworks.com/Script02Pg1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109092935/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script02Pg1.html)). You might be able to use Fontseek to locate a copy of Daniela at a free site.

Thank all of you for help. I converted "Daniela" to Mac font, and proofed it to the customer. Hopefully they'll like it although "f" looks a bit different.   
   
I appreciate you guys!!
